```{r setup, include=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("p8105/p8105.datasets")
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(p8105.datasets)
```
Problem 1
```{r Problem1}
data("brfs_smart2010")
brfss_data = brfss_smart2010 %>%
janitor::clean_names() %>%
filter(topic == "Overall Health") %>%
filter(response == "Excellent"| response == "Very good" | response == "Good" | response == "Fair" | response == "Poor")
brfss_data$response = factor (brfss_data$response,levels = c("Excellent","Very good","Good","Fair","Poor"))
brfss_data
```
*** Q1: In 2002, which states were observed at 7 locations?

*** A1: Three states CT,FL,NC were observed at 7 locations in 2002.
```{r Question1}
brfss_data %>%
group_by(year,locationabbr) %>%
summarize(n_obs=n()/5) %>%
filter(year == "2002",n_obs==7)
```

```{r Question2}
observation_date <- count(count(brfss_data,year,locationabbr,locationdesc),year,locationabbr)

```
